ygData.subject: Re: reef sharks
ygData.msgSnippet: You can finish the quest by buying 2 shark skins instead. Reef sharks are very rare & only available by swimming in the ocean of tears. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
You can finish the quest by buying 2 shark skins instead. Reef sharks are
very rare & only available by swimming in the ocean of tears.

----- Original Message -----
From: <rmiller@...>
To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 4:51 PM
Subject: [eqpaladin] reef sharks


> From: rmiller@...
>
> I am a level 8 paladin, and the only quest that I have attempted from the
Guild instructors wanted me to kill some reef sharks and bring back the
skins. I can't find the reef sharks in the Ocean of Tears anywhere. I have
found one hammerhead shark and killed it but didn't get a skin. Any idea
where to find "reef sharks"??? Just a hint would be great! Thanks for your
help.
>
> Grod
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Did you know that ONElist hosts some of the largest lists on the Internet?
> http://www.ONElist.com
> Our scaleable system is the most reliable free e-mail service on the
Internet!
